issue.title: [Release] Helper script for rebasing open pull requests on master
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5865](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5865). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a script so we don't have to manually rebase all open pull requests off of master.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5865?focusedCommentId=16879751) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
